text: Hi all - I built a web payments form into a HubSpot landing page and want to make it available for designers/developers to use in their landing page and website projects via the Marketplace; it would also come with support for how to set up the server side code. I'm just unclear where this fits into HubSpot's Marketplace...do I sell it as a Module, a Template, or an App?
Is it a stand alone module?
Yes it's a standalone HubSpot Module - there's also a server side component which I've built using Google Cloud Functions.
<@U38EZFVFE> the module also relies on a couple of external JavaScript libraries.
link the libraries to the module and sell it as a module. the server side code needs to delt with a seperate way
